attributes.additional_details:
Todays Edexcel Core Mathematics 3 exam was a complete diabolical, the questions were practically impossible, there was no questions suitable for students aiming for lower grades, the paper was unlike any other set by the examination board and contained questions who's marks do not correspond to the amount of time needed to think about and work out the answer.
I think its time that Edexcel were made to answer us and give us an expiation for purposeful designing an examination to make students fail.

rejection.details: You should discuss any concerns you have over this exam with the school – who can advise you about what happens next. You are also free to contact the Edexcel exam board directly, if you wish, to discuss your concerns further.
